r.s: Provides methods for dumping structured information about a variable.
r.d:
The Var_Dump class is a wrapper for the var_dump function.
The var_dump function displays structured information about expressions that includes its type and value. Arrays are explored recursively with values indented to show structure.
The Var_Dump class captures the output of the var_dump function, by using output control functions, and then uses external renderer classes for displaying the result in various graphical ways : * Simple text, * (X)HTML text, * (X)HTML table, * XML, * ...
r.n: - Corrected a bug in the handling of a reference to a variable. - Better handling of configuration options with mixed singleton and factory objects. - Added Var_Dump::displayInit() method to initialise the singleton object used by the display() method. - Code cleanup.
